body:
Create Procedure $CURSOR$ (

/* Interaktif */
@Cevap tinyint , @SoruNo smallint Output , @msjText varchar(200) Output , @Sonuc tinyint Output)
As
Set NoCount On
Begin
    Begin Try
        Declare @IslemOk tinyint 

        Set @IslemOk = 0
        If IsNull(@SoruNo,-1) = -1 Begin
            Set @msjText = 'İŞİ BAŞLATMAK İSTEDİĞİNİZDEN EMİN MİSİNİZ?'
            Set @SoruNo = 10
            Set @Sonuc = 1
        End Else
		If @SoruNo = 10 Begin
            If @Cevap = 0 Begin
				Set @IslemOk = 1
            End Else Begin
                Set @Sonuc = 0
            End
        End 
		If @IslemOk = 1 Begin
		
				/* TO-DO */

            Set @Sonuc = 0
        End
    End Try 
    Begin Catch	
        Declare @ITObjectName nVarchar(126)
        Set @ITObjectName = Object_Name(@@PROCID)
        Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName
    End Catch
End
Go
